%dw 2.0
type child_customer = {| category: {| internalId: String, "type": String |}, StringCustomFieldRef__custentity6: String, StringCustomFieldRef__custentity31: String, StringCustomFieldRef__custentity17: String, StringCustomFieldRef__custentity18: String, StringCustomFieldRef__custentity19: String, StringCustomFieldRef__custentity12: String, email: String, phone: String, entityId: String, firstName: String, lastName: String, isPerson: String, taxable: String, taxItem: {| internalId: String |}, customForm: {| internalId: String |}, parent: {| internalId: String |}, entityStatus: {| internalId: String |} |} {"example": "{\\\"category\\\":{\\\"internalId\\\":\\\"22\\\",\\\"type\\\":\\\"CUSTOMER_CATEGORY\\\"},\\\"StringCustomFieldRef__custentity6\\\":\\\"48\\\",\\\"StringCustomFieldRef__custentity31\\\":\\\"1010\\\",\\\"StringCustomFieldRef__custentity17\\\":\\\"2\\\",\\\"StringCustomFieldRef__custentity18\\\":\\\"3\\\",\\\"StringCustomFieldRef__custentity19\\\":\\\"18\\\",\\\"StringCustomFieldRef__custentity12\\\":\\\"8\\\",\\\"email\\\":\\\"abc@abc.com\\\",\\\"phone\\\":\\\"0000000\\\",\\\"entityId\\\":\\\"1234\\\",\\\"firstName\\\":\\\"fname\\\",\\\"lastName\\\":\\\"lname\\\",\\\"isPerson\\\":\\\"true\\\",\\\"taxable\\\":\\\"true\\\",\\\"taxItem\\\":{\\\"internalId\\\":\\\"10710\\\"},\\\"customForm\\\":{\\\"internalId\\\":\\\"1\\\"},\\\"parent\\\":{\\\"internalId\\\":\\\"38562\\\"},\\\"entityStatus\\\":{\\\"internalId\\\":\\\"13\\\"}}"}
